item.description:
Hi Everyone,
I'm ready for some good old fashioned, band playing rock n' roll, how about youi? I've never seen this band, but here's the link, sounds like my kind of music...
http://www.openbarban...

I'll be going for dinner at 7:30 and to hopefully avoid the cover charge, which is usually $5, I'll get there around 7:15. Please put in your reply if you'll be joining me for dinner.

Band starts playing at 9pm

Whippersnappers is conveniently located on route 102 in Londonderry in the "londonderry commons" mall.

Hope to boogie with you later...
susan
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have meetup signs on the tables...come early and help me get some :)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: " Open Bar Band" at Whippersnappers in Londonderry!
